name: mentions-regex
content:
abc @abc foo
@ abc@foo xyz
abc @ abc
abc some@email.de far
abc @_lead
abc @tun_lang
abc @dce
abc @goo.gl
abc @xyz!os
abc @qux*dex
abc @ubu^ntu
abc @foo!bar
abc @hash#tag
abc @musta{che
abc @@foobar   // should not match
abc @@pub@sub  // should not match
abc @#tag ok   // should match
abc@qux*dex
invalid @\\os
invalid @*inv
author: tunnckoCore
